text: Stop, stop right now!  I'm warning you, sir!  That's it! That's it! South Park is disqualified!

title: THE LOSING EDGE
text: Yeah!

title: THE LOSING EDGE
text: Aww!

title: THE LOSING EDGE
text: South Park has been disqualified from the game! Denver wins!

title: THE LOSING EDGE
text: We... We lost.

title: THE LOSING EDGE
text: What? I thought this was a free country!

title: THE LOSING EDGE
text: Dad!  You're the greatest.
